GSD37gautdhcu:5: kriyate 'dya mayā bhāṣyaṃ sūnunā vāmanasya tu //
GSD37gautdhcu:12: athavā-puruṣasya sukhaduḥkhopabhogārthaiḥ śarīrendriyaviṣayaiḥ saṃyogaviyogarūpo janmajarāmaraṇaprabandhaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:15: tadubhayamaparijñāne na sambhavatīti dharmādharmasvarūpāvabodhanārthaṃ gautamena śāstraṃ praṇītamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:27: tasya svata eva siddheḥ anyathā yena prāmāṇyaṃ pratipādyate tasyāpyanyena prāmāṇyaṃ tasyāpyanyenetyanavasthā syāditi //
GSD37gautdhcu:30: ceducyate-vedavacanāduccaritāttatpadārthavidāṃ viśiṣṭer'the yā pratipattirniḥsaṃdigdhā jāyate na ca kālāntare deśāntare puruṣāntare 'vasthāntare vā viparyeti sā dharmamūlamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:31: yacca niḥsaṃdigdhamaviparītaṃ ca jñānamutpadyate tasya prāmāṇyamadhyavasituṃ śakyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:34: kartṛgato hi doṣaḥ śabdajanitasya pratyayasya mithyātvamāpādayati /
GSD37gautdhcu:36: idānīṃ sūtraṃ vibrīyate-tatra vedo mantrabrāhmaṇākhyo grantharāśiḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:41: śrutiśtu vedo vijñeyo dharmaśāstraṃ tu vai smṛtiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:49: tatra vidhipratiṣedhātmako hi vedo dharmādyavabodhakatvaṃ pratipadyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:50: na tu mantrārthavādarūpa iti ceducyate- arthavādāderapi vidhyekavākyatvenopakārakatvāt pāraṃparyeṇa dharmamūlatvamaviruddham /
GSD37gautdhcu:58: ā haiva sa nakhāgrebhyaḥ paramaṃ tapyate tapaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:72: dharmaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ-varṇadharma āśramadharmo guṇadharmo varṇāśramadharmo nimittadharma iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:79: sūtrārambhaprayojanaṃ ca-yathaiva vedo dharmamūlaṃ tathā smṛtiśīle apīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:80: na kevalaṃ veda eva dharmamūlaṃ, kiṃ tarhi-
GSD37gautdhcu:82: vedavidāṃ ca ye smṛtiśīle te api dharmamūle bhavataḥ te api vedāvirodhinī,
GSD37gautdhcu:99: ācārātmatuṣṭī api śīla evāntarbhūte iti na pṛthagupanyaste /
GSD37gautdhcu:101: idānīṃ pūrvapakṣīkaroti vedavidāṃ śīlaṃ dharmamūlaṃ na bhavati yataḥ-
GSD37gautdhcu:108: atrāpi dharmamūlatvaṃ na prāpnotīti śeṣaḥ caśabdopādānāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:111: tena śāstraṃ lokasaṃvyavahāraṃ cānavekṣya yat kriyate tat sāhasam /
GSD37gautdhcu:123: dṛṣṭārtho dṛṣṭaprayojanaḥ tasmin dṛṣṭaprayojane śīlaṃ dharmamūlaṃ na bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:128: tasmin gṛhyamāṇe“īdudet“ityādinā pragṛhyasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ“dṛṣṭārthe avaradaurbalyāt“iti pāṭhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSD37gautdhcu:129: avaradaurbalyāt na varaḥ avaro nikṛṣṭaḥ dveṣādyabhibhūtaḥ aparamārthajñāna ityarthaḥ tasya daurbalyāt dharmādharmaparijñānāśakterityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:130: etaccānena jñāpitaṃ bhavati- mahatāmapi tadvidāṃ kadā cidabhibhavo 'stīti,
GSD37gautdhcu:137: evaṃ smṛtipramāṇamuktvā adhunā ekārthopanipatitānāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparavirodhe sati kiṃ kravyamityāta āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:152: nanu-cātra sārmathyādeva vikalpaprasiddheḥ anarthakamidaṃ sūtraṃ samuccayastāvadatra na saṃbhatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:153: na hyanudite hutvā punarudite hotuṃ śakyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:168: evaṃ smṛtyācāravirodhe ca mātuladuhitṛpariṇayanādyācāro bādhyata iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:171: avirodhe tu tulyapramāṇaśiṣṭānāṃ samuccayaḥ yathā ācamanādīnāṃ śrauteṣu karmasviti //
GSD37gautdhcu:172: nanu ca yadi vedaliṅgaprabhavatvābhyupagama eva smṛteḥ śrutyā sahātulyabalatvamupapādyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:173_0: tadā hi mantrārthavādavākyeṣvanyapareṣvapi yāni smārtadharmamabalabhūtāni liṅgāni“kumārā
GSD37gautdhcu:173_1: viśikhā iva“ityevamādīni teṣāṃ pratyakṣavedavākyavirodhe sati virodhivākyānumānavirodhāt
GSD37gautdhcu:174: yadā tūtsannaśākhāpūrvikā smṛtirabhyupagame-yathā'hāpastambaḥ-“brāhmaṇoktā vidhayasteṣāmutsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogādanumīyante“iti tadobhayośca vaidikatvāt tulyabalataiva prasajyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:175: na hyanumitasya vedavākyasya pratyakṣasya ca balābalaviśeṣo 'sti pratyakṣānumānaparicchinnāgnivaditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:176: syādetat yatra smṛtivacane vedavirodho 'sti tannaiva vedavākyānumāpakaṃ bhavati,
GSD37gautdhcu:180: yadāpi vedavadavicchinnapāraṃparyeṇāgatā smṛtirabhyupagamyate tadāpi tulyabalatvamupapadyata iti tatrāpi tannaivopapadyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:181: yastāvanmātuladuhitṛpariṇayanādikaḥ samācāra upanyastaḥ sa kāmādyabhibhave sati duṣṭācāratvācchiṣṭācāra eva nopapadyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:182: yastvavigānenoktalakṣaṇaiḥ śiṣṭairācaryate tasya vedamūlatvāviśeṣāt smṛtyā saha tulyabalatvameva prāpnoti /
GSD37gautdhcu:184: na ca samācārasya smṛtivākyāntaritarūpsaya vedavākyānumānasaṃnikarṣakṛtaṃ balābalatvaṃ sidhyati //
GSD37gautdhcu:186: yadi hi tulyabalānyetāni syuḥ tadā virodhe vikalpaḥ sārmathyādeva siddhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:193: sa pakṣaḥ“tadvidāṃ ca smṛtiśīle“ityetasmin sati durupapāda eveti /
GSD37gautdhcu:196: kvacit smṛtyā śruterbādhadarśanāt yathā sāmānyena pravṛtto vaidikakarmādhikāraḥ smṛtyā upanītādipuruṣaviśeṣa evādhikriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:198: tathā gāmālabheteti śruticodito 'pi govadhaḥ smārtapratiṣedhabalīyastvānna kriyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:199: tathāgnihotrādikaṃ coditajīvanopādhikaṃ karma dravyasādhyamapi na smārtacauryādipratiṣaddhenāpi dravyamārjayitvā tatkriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:202: yatra tu virodhābhāvaḥ tatra durbalopi naiva bādhyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:203: yastāvadupanītasya karmādhikāraḥ saḥ śrutyā naiva virudhyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:207: yaccoktaṃ govardhestu śruticoditopi na kriyata iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:209: kintu mantravarṇācca 'mā gāḥ pramāpayāśvān pramāpaya'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:213: tatra vicāryate-kiṃ smaraṇātpūrvameva naṣṭāḥ śākhāḥ utottarakālamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:220: āpastamboktasyāpyayamabhiprāyaḥ-utsannāḥ kvacitkvaciddeśe na sarvatreti 'teṣāmutsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogādanumīyante';
GSD37gautdhcu:225: vedasya agnerācāryasya yamaniyamānāṃ vā samīpe nayanamupanayanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:231: na ca dvijatvavat brāhmaṇatvaṃ kriyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:235: kāmyaṃ tu brāhmaṇasya navame pañcame vā syāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:242: pañcame navama iti vācye kramabhedaḥ anayorantarā kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ kāmyakālaparigrahārthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:246: tathācaca smṛtyantaraṃ-'navame tvāyuṣmākaṃ pañcame brahmavarcasakāmam'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:270: alpaṃ vā bahu vā yasya śrutasyopakaroti yaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:288: yadā tu nityakāmyayoḥ kenaciddurbhikṣādinā nimittenātikramaḥ syāt tadānīmāpatkalpamāha-
GSD37gautdhcu:305: dvābhyāmadhikābhyāṃ sahitā yā dvāviṃśatiḥ sā dvyadhikāḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:320: mauñjī trivṛt samā ślakṣṇā kāryā viprasya mekhalā /
GSD37gautdhcu:321: kṣatriyasya tu maurvī jyā vaiśyasya śaṇatāntavī //
GSD37gautdhcu:343: viṣamasaṅkhyatvādeva sarveṣāṃ siddheḥ smṛtyantare 'śāṇaṃ kṣaumaṃ vāso brāhmaṇasya';
GSD37gautdhcu:344: iti tadāśritya yadyathāsaṅkhyaṃ tannivṛttyarthaṃ sarveṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:375: yajñārhe vā syāt vibhītakabilvakayāvakādirvarjito vṛkṣaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:405: śikhā eva jaṭā yasya sa śikhājaṭaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:407: cakāro vār'thaḥ pratyekamabhisambadhyate-muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā śikhājaṭo veti /
GSD37gautdhcu:411: muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā syādasya vā syācchikhājaṭaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:415: brāhmaṇabhojanādau pravṛtto dravyahastaḥ pūrvamanucchiṣṭaḥ kenacitkāraṇenocchiṣṭasparśādaprayato bhavati,
GSD37gautdhcu:424: yattu dravyasya smṛtyantare prokṣaṇamukta-'bhūmau nikṣipya prokṣaṇāddravyaṃ śuddhyati';
GSD37gautdhcu:426: kathaṃ punastulyasaṃhite sūtre viśeṣo 'vagamyate-nidhāyācacamanaṃ na punaranidhāyeti /
GSD37gautdhcu:445: tejasā hetubhūtena yāni kriyante tāni taijasāni sauvarṇādīni /
GSD37gautdhcu:448: tathā cauśanasaṃ-'taijasānāṃ mūtrapurīṣaretaḥ kuṇapopahatānāṃ āvartanamullekhanaṃ bhasmanā triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ parimārjanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:467: dāravāṇāṃ āsanaśayanādīnāṃ aṇedhyādyupahatānāṃ takṣaṇaṃ tanūkaraṇaṃ yāvanmātramupahatam /
GSD37gautdhcu:493: bhūmiḥ, gṛhādiḥ dāruvaditi prakṛtidravyeṇātideśaṃ bruvan etat jñāpayati-yat vikārasya śocamucyate prakṛtidravyasyāpi tadeva bhavatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:510: yathālepaṃ vikalpena samuccayena vā śaucaṃ kartavyam //
GSD37gautdhcu:513: vidalaḥ vaṃśamayūrapakṣādiniṣpannaḥ carma vyāghracarmādi teṣāmaspṛśyaspṛṣṭānāṃ celavat vastravacchaucam /
GSD37gautdhcu:531: evaṃ ca pādaprakṣālanādikamapi taddigabhimukha eva kuryāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:534: śucau deśa āsīno dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ jānvantarā kṛtvā yajñopavītyā maṇibandhātpāṇī prakṣālya vāgyato hṛdayaspṛśastriścaturvāpa ācāmet // Gaut_1.38 //
GSD37gautdhcu:538: tathā ca vakhiṣṭhaḥ- 'prakṣālya pādau pāṇo cā maṇibandhanāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:540: tathāca vasiṣṭhaḥ-'vrajan tiṣṭhan śayānaḥ praṇato vā nācāmet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:543: yadi kadācit ayajñopavīti bhūtvāpyāste tathāpyācamane avaśyaṃ yajñopavītinā bhavitavyamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:544: tathā cāpaspambaḥ-'upāsane gurūṇāṃ vṛddhānāmatithīnāṃ home japyakarmaṇi bhojana ācamane svādhyāye ca yajñopavīti syāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:558: abgrahaṇaṃ gomūtrādinivṛttyarthaṃ teṣāṃ śuddhihetutvasāmānyādgrahaṇaṃ mā bhūditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:561: tatra tūśanā'ha- 'dakṣiṇaṃ hastatalaṃ gokarṇākāraṃ vinyasya brāhmeṇa tīrthenāśabdaṃ pibedṛgyajuḥsāmavedān dhyāyan'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:568: tatra tūktaṃ kaṇvena-'atharvavedetihāsapurāṇāni dhyāyan brāhmeṇa tīrthenoṣṭhayoḥ salomapradeśaṃ mṛjyāt'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:581_1: candrādityau dhyātvā tata upaspṛśya tarjanyaṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ nāsikāvakāśau prāṇān dhyātvā
GSD37gautdhcu:581_2: tata upaspṛśya kaniṣṭhikāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ karṇau diśo dhyātvā tata upaspṛśyāṅguṣṭhena
GSD37gautdhcu:583: mūrdhani cet vaktavye dadyāditi grahaṇaṃ sarvāṅgulyartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:584: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ 'sarvāṅgulibhiḥ śriyaṃ dhyātvā mūrdhani prakṣipet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:586: tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ-'mūrdhani ca dadyātsavye pāṇau'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:588: iti smṛtyantarābhidhānāt strīśūdrayośca sakṛtpānāt sakṛdoṣṭhasparśanācca śuddhirdraṣṭavyā atrānuktāpi //
GSD37gautdhcu:591: suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā ca punaḥ // Gaut_1.43 //
GSD37gautdhcu:594: tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ- 'suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā snātvā pītvā ruditvā cācāntaḥ punarācāmet'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:595: tatra kṣutasyāniyatakālatvāt ādāvaśakyamācamanamiti cet tatrāpi nityaprāyatyārtha ārambhaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:598: atastatrādāvante cācamanaṃ kuryāt tatra bhojane kecidādāvapi dvirācamanamicchanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:601: 'suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā snātvā pītvā ruditvā cācāntaḥ punarācāmeddvi'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:602: evaṃ ca bhojane ādāvante cca dvirācamanaṃ svāpādāvekamante ca dviḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:610: satyapi jihvābhimarśane yāvat svasthānānna cyavanti tāvacchucirityeke manyante //
GSD37gautdhcu:612: cyuteṣu āsye yajjalaṃ tadāsrāve yadvadvijātīyāt tannigiran śucacireva bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:616: kutaḥ cyuteṣu nigiran śuciriti vaktavye āsrāvavadvidyādityārambhāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:621: yathocchiṣṭāvayavo bahirbhūtaḥ aśucitvamāpādayati tadvadāsrāvasyāpi prāpta āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:622: na mukhyā vipruṣa ucchiṣṭaṃ kurvanti na cedaṅge nipatanti // Gaut_1.47 //
GSD37gautdhcu:623: mukhe bhavā mukhyāḥ vipruṣa āsrābāvayavāḥ te mantrayamāṇasya vinirgatā nāprāyatyaṃ janayanti yadyaṅge stanodarādau na nipatanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:624: niśabdo niścayārthaḥ ato niścayena yadyaṅge patanti tadānīmevocchiṣṭaṃ janayanti nāśaṅkāmātreṇeti /
GSD37gautdhcu:629: lepagandhayorapanayane kṛte amedhyaliptasya amedhyasambaddhasya śucitvaṃ bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:633: śleṣmāśru dūṣikā svedo dvādaśaite nṛṇāṃ malāḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:636: śaucādhikāre punaḥ śaucagrahaṇaṃ taijasādīnāmapi lepagandhāpanayanayādeva śaucamityevamartham //
GSD37gautdhcu:642: tadadbhirmṛdā ceti vaktavye pūrvagrahaṇaṃ yatra nātīva lepo lakṣyate tatrādbhireva śasaucamityevamarthaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:647: athavā yatra yatra śaucamuktaṃ tatra tatrādbhireva śaucaṃ prathamaṃ kāryamityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:648: yathā mṛdā adbhiriti samuccīyate tathā bhasmādibhirapi samuccayārtho visamāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:649: taisajādīnāṃ dravyāṇāmuktatvāt idaṃ śaucaṃ śarīrāvayavasyāmedhyaliptasya draṣṭavyam //
GSD37gautdhcu:657: ityanena siddhatvāt lepagandhāpakarṣaṇaṃ ca mṛtsalilaprakṣālanena kuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:659: ityatra yaduktaṃ cūrṇādinā annalepāpakarṣaṇaṃ tenāśakyamidaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:663: kathaṃ-tadgrahaṇenānnalepāpakarṣaṇamuktaṃ tadapakarṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataācāmedityevamarthaṃ anyathā sandehaḥ syāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:664: tathā cāpastambaḥ 'mūtraṃ kṛtvā pūrīṣaṃ vā mūtrapurīṣalepānannalepānucchiṣṭalepān
GSD37gautdhcu:665: retasaśca ye lepāstān prakṣālya pādau cācamya prayato bhavati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:673: sa yatra yajñaviṣaye sphyādīnāṃ prakṣālanamātrādeva śuddhiṃ vidadhyāt tatra tadeva,
GSD37gautdhcu:675: atulyabalatvādevedaṃ siddhamiti cet śrutyuktasya laukike ananupraveśanārtha upanyāsaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:676: yathār davyā yāgaviṣaye śrutyā prakṣālanena śuddhiruktā,
GSD37gautdhcu:678: darvīsāmānyena śrutyuktā mā bhūt smṛtyuktāmeva kuryādityevamarthamupanyāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:680: sa yatra śaucaṃ vidadhyāt tatra tadeva,
GSD37gautdhcu:682: taduktatvādevāsandeha iti cet ucyate- yasminviṣaye na kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantaroktaṃ bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:683: yatra lepagandhāpakarṣaṇādi kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantareṇa vikalpaśaṅkā bhavatīti tannirāsārthamuktaṃ 'yatra cāmnāyo vidadhyāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:687: pāṇinā savyamupasaṅgṛhyānaṅguṣṭhamadhīhi bho ityāmantrayeta gurum // Gaut_1.52 //
GSD37gautdhcu:688: pāṇinā dakṣiṇena savyaṃ pāṇimanaṅguṣṭhavarjitaṃ gṛhītvā adhīhi bho iti prārthayeta gurumadhyāpakam /
GSD37gautdhcu:726: savyena savyaḥ spṛṣṭavyo dakṣiṇena tu dakṣiṇaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:736: anujñāta upaviśetprāṅmukho dakṣiṇataḥ śiṣya udaṅmukho vā // Gaut_1.60 //
GSD37gautdhcu:737: ācāryeṇādiṣṭaḥ tasya dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vopaviśet saṃbhavato vikalpaḥ āsīnasyācāryasya yathā tadabhimukho bhavati tathā prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā upaviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:742: iti ca niyamārthaḥ nānanujñāta upaviśennādakṣiṇata iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:749: tripadā caiva gāyatrī vijñeyā brahmaṇo mukham //
GSD37gautdhcu:765: sāvitrī cānuvacanaṃ tato 'dhīyīteti vaktavye ādito brahmaṇa ādāna ityārambhāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:772: yadyadhīyatāmantarā madhye kaścidgacchettataḥ punarapi pādopasaṅgrahaṇādipraṇavoccāraṇānto yo vidhistaṃ kuryāttasya prāyaścittārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:784: śvādīnāṃ pratyekamantarā manage tryahaṃ bhaktatyāgaḥ prāyaścittaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:807: tatastrīnprāṇāyāmān dhārayitvā ghṛtaṃ prāśyopasadanaṃ ca kṛtvādhīyīta,
GSD37gautdhcu:814: tathā cāhośanā- 'anabhisandhyā śmaśānābhyadhyayane 'dhīhi bho ityuktvādhīyīta'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:815: cakārādanantaroktasya praṇāyāmādeḥ sarvasya prāptau evaṃśabdena anantaroktasyopasadanasyaiva prāptiḥ kriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:816: tarhyevaṃśabda eva vaktavya iti cet na,
GSD37gautdhcu:818: kathaṃ ? evaṃśabde caśabde vā vaktavye ubhayapāṭhasya prayojanāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ nyāyyaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:821: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'śmaśānasamīpe 'dhītya prāṇān dhārayet prāṇopasparśanamabhivādanaṃ sāvitryanuvācanaṃ'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:850: nanu ca rājadaṇḍaprāyaścittāni ca vihitākaraṇe niṣiddhasevane vā vidhīyante /
GSD37gautdhcu:853: na cāsya vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā śrūyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:858: atrocyate-yadvihitākaraṇe pratipiddhasevane vā prāyaścittamuktaṃ rājadaṇḍo vā tadubhayamasyāpi prāpnotyeva /
GSD37gautdhcu:859: yadyapyasyaivoddeśena vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā na śrūyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:865: ityanena sūtreṇa upanayanādārabhya yo vidhirucyate-tadvyatikrame eva prāyaścittaṃ nānyavyatikrame iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:868: tathāpi nityopanayanakālātītasya bhinnabuddheḥ śaktasya ekādaśavarṣādūrdhvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣātprāk prāyaścittārdhapraveśanārthaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:882: tadvyatikrame bālasya sataḥ pitrādīnāṃ prāyaścittasya śravaṇāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:884: idānīṃ sūtraṃ vivriyate-upanayanātprākkāmacāra icchāgatiḥ tasmāccaṇḍālasparśanādau prokṣaṇamātraṃ vakṣyati 'avokṣaṇebhyaḥ';
GSD37gautdhcu:897: kāmavāde abhiśaṃsādau kāmabhakṣaṇe surāpānādau cātyantavālyāvasthāyāmapi yatnato nivārayitavya-,
GSD37gautdhcu:917: yathāpariveṣṭitaśirasaḥ kṛṣṭādāvapi mūtrapurīṣāvutpadyete tiṣṭhato vā tathā tatraiva kuryādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:931: asyonapañcavarṣasyāpamārjanādibhyaḥ anyatra kiñcidapi śaucaprakāraḥ na vidyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:949: dvayameva prayojanaṃ śaucavidhānasya dṛśyate itarasparśayogyārthamanuṣṭhānārthaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:963: aśuciṃ spṛśate yastu eka eva hi duṣyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:964: taṃ spṛṣṭvānyo na duṣyeta sarvadravyeṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:979: kāmacāritvādyatrakutracinmantramadhītyāgnihotrādau yadi svayameva pravartate tadā taṃ dṛṣṭvānumantāpi na syādityevamartha evaśabdaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:986: naiva kanyā na yuvatirnālpavidyo na bāliśaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:989: tatrālpavidyapratiṣedhādeva pratiṣedhe siddhe nāsaṃskṛta iti pratiṣedho 'nyasya viduṣo 'bhāvelpavidyasyāpi saṃskṛtasyābhyanujñānārthamiti pratipāditam /
GSD37gautdhcu:993: evaṃ cāgnihavanabalirharaṇayoḥ kanyāyā api niyogapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:997: tathā ca smṛtyantaraṃ-'patnyaupāsanaṃ juhuyādvaiśvadevaṃ ca'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1005: ityanena vedādhyayanavidhānādevānupanītasya pratiṣedhe siddhe vedasya punaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ veda eva nādhyāpayitavyaḥ iti niyamārthaḥ tataścāṅgādhyāpane na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1010: amuṣmai svadhetyuktvā yatpiṇḍodakādi pretebhyo dīyate tatsvadhāninayanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1018: upanayanādārabhya yo vidhiruktaḥ sa niyamasaṃjño bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:1020: ato vā ārabhya niyamaḥ vratadhāraṇaṃ yo vakṣyate 'gnīndhanādiḥ sa niyamaḥ upanayanādiḥ kartavyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1040: tatrāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ parītyāgnimityanena samiddhoma ukta ityuktam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1042: iti dvirbhojanaśravaṇāt sāyaṃ prātaḥ dviragnīndhanamapi draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1064: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ vrāhyaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyameva ca //
GSD37gautdhcu:1066: āpo hiṣṭheti ca brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ gorajaḥ smṛtam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1067: yattu syātsātapaṃ varṣaṃ divyaṃ snānaṃ taducyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1083: godānaṃ nāma chandogānāṃ dvitīyaṃ vrataṃ anyeṣāmapi ṣoḍaśe varṣe dhārayitavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1089: eka iti vacanāt na tu gautamaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1096: bahirabhyantare vā yatra kutra cicchuddhadeśe kartavyamiti gautamamatam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1097: idānīṃ prasaṅgāt tat sandhyopāsanaṃ kadā kathaṃ ca kartavyamityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1110: paścimāṃ tu samāsīno malaṃ hanti divā kṛtam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1114: yaḥ kālo nakṣatrajyotiṣā saha vartata sa sajyotiḥ tasmin sajyotiṣi kāle ārambhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1116: tata ā jyotiṣo darśanāt-pūrvasyāmādityadarśanāt uttarasyāṃ nakṣatradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1117: ā jyotiṣa iti vaktavye darśanagrahaṇaṃ sampagartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1120: prajñāṃ yaśaśca kīrtiṃ ca brahmavarcasameva ca //
GSD37gautdhcu:1134: tathā'hośanā-'sāyaṃ prātarudakaṃ gatvā pūto bhūtvā pavitreṇa mārjayitvā āpohiṣṭhīyābhistisṛbhirabliṅgābhiḥ vāmadevyena ca,
GSD37gautdhcu:1135_0: tataḥ śuco deśe darbheṣvāsīno darbhāndhārayamāṇaḥ pratyaṅmukho vāgyata ātmānaṃ dhyātvā
GSD37gautdhcu:1135_1: tataḥ sarecakaṣūrakakumbhakādīn trīn prāṇāyāmān dhārayitvā ṛṣicchabdodevatādhyānapūrvakaṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:1135_2: bhūrbhuvaḥsvarityādikāṃ sāvitrīṃ sahasrakṛtva āvartayecchatakṛtvo vā daśāvarāmathottiṣṭhamnagniyamabrahmabhyaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1135_3: pratyagdakṣiṇodīcyāsu namaskṛtvā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā punarapi pratīcīṃ diśaṃ namaskuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1139: yadi sandhyākālayorevāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadānīmekameva sūtraṃ kriyeta 'tiṣṭhetpūrvāmāsītottarāṃ sajyotipyā jyotiṣo darśanādvāgyato nādityamīkṣeta'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1144: abhiprāyaśca smṛtyantarokto draṣṭavyaḥ yathā cāhośanā-'nekṣetādityaṃ sandhyāgataṃ madhyaṃdinagataṃ rāhugrastaṃ vāristham'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1152: tatrāpyāturasyauṣadhārthaṃ gurorucchiṣṭasya māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe na doṣaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1153: 'sa cedavyādhīyīta kāmaṃ gurorucchiṣṭaṃ bhaiṣajyārthe sarvaṃ prāśnīyāt';
GSD37gautdhcu:1175: viśeṣata eva lokaprasiddherna gandhasāmānyasya grahaṇaṃ bhavatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1191: harṣaḥ prītiḥ evaṃ ca taddhetūnāṃ nāṭakādīnāṃ prekṣaṇasyāpi pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1201: kutaḥ ? yadyācāryasyaiva grahaṇaṃ tadānīṃ ācāryadarśana iti vaktavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1203: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'manyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sakāśe saṃkucitastiṣṭhet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1213: tathā cāpastambaḥ-'na smayeta yadi smayetāpapṛhya smayeteti brāhmaṇaṃ'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1232: evaṃ ca gurorapyanurūpā sevā na kartavyā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1239: ācāryasya tatputrasya ca tadbhāryāyāśca dīkṣitasya ca saṃjñāṃ pitrādikṛtāṃ noccārayet //
GSD37gautdhcu:1246: madyaṃ guḍamadhupiṣṭakṛtaṃ anyadapi yanmadakaraṃ yatsarvaṃ brāhmaṇo nityaṃ prāgapyupanayanādvarjayet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1247: evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ prāgupanayanādūrdhvaṃ ca brahmacaryāt paiṣṭīvarjitāyāḥ surāyā apratiṣedhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1250: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1251: yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijottamaiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1279: ācāryaṃ caiva tatputraṃ tadbhāryāṃ dīkṣitaṃ gurum /
GSD37gautdhcu:1280: pitaraṃ ca pitṛvyaṃ ca mātaraṃ mātulaṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1281: hitaiṣiṇaṃ ca vidvāṃsaṃ śvaśuraṃ patimeva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1282: na brūyānnāmato vidvān mātuśca bhaginīṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1283: yadi brūyāttu taṃ dhyātvā namaskṛtvā vadedatha //
GSD37gautdhcu:1287: śreyān hitaiṣī vayasā ca vṛddha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1294: etāni vihāya tyaktvā pratiśravaṇaṃ prativacanaṃ dadyādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1296: adṛṣṭena guruṇā ājñāyāṃ dīyamānāyāṃ abhikramaṇaṃ tadabhimukhena gamanaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1298: yadā guruḥ adho nīcaiḥ tiṣṭhet āsīta vā,
GSD37gautdhcu:1303: kūpasthitaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā taṭākasthaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1307: evaṃ sūtrārthaśca tadānīṃ draṣṭavyaḥ adhaḥsthānāsanatiryagvātasevāyāmuttiṣṭhet apayāyācca krameṇeti tatrādhaḥsthānāsane dṛṣṭvottiṣṭhet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1312: tena anuktamapi samuccīyate āsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā uttiṣṭhet śayānaṃ dṛṣṭvā'sīteti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1317: yadasya karma kartavyaṃ tatkaromītyācāryasya vijñāpya tatkṛtvā kṛtamityākhyāya tiṣṭhet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1333: tasya yau savarṇau sadṛśau bhāryāputrau tayorapi priyahitayoryuktaḥsyāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1341_0: tathācāpastambaḥ-'proṣito bhaikṣādagnau kṛtvā bhuñjīta bhaikṣaṃ haviṣā saṃstutaṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:1341_1: tatrācāryo devatārtha āhavanīyārthe ca taṃ bhojayitvā yaducchiṣṭaṃ prāśnāti havirucchaṣṭameva tat'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1353: yuvatīnāṃ taruṇīnāṃ viproṣyāpi na kāryamityeke manyante na tu
GSD37gautdhcu:1370: na cānāpadyapi brahmacāriṇaḥ śūdrābhyanujñānamanena kalpayituṃ yuktaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1375: tasmādanāpadyeva brahmacāriṇaḥ apraśastadvijātiprāpaṇārthoyamārambhaḥ apraśastānāmaviśeṣeṇa prāptau satyāṃ 'abhiśastapatitavarjaṃ';
GSD37gautdhcu:1377: itarathā śūdraprāpaṇe sati abhiśastādīnāṃ prāptyabhāvādeva pratiṣedho na yujyata iti na ca śakyate vaktuṃ śūdraviṣaya evāyamapavāda iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1378: yatra hi dvijātayaḥ praśastā adhikriyante tatra śūdro 'pi praśasta eveti itarasya prasaṅga eva nāstīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1379: tena prathamakalpastāvat brahmacāriṇaḥ praśastebhya eva bhaikṣacaraṇaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1387: varṇagrahaṇaṃ śūdrasyāpi prāpaṇārthaṃ asati varṇagrahaṇe sarvagrahaṇaṃ tayoreva syāditi tadarthaṃ varṇagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1389: tataśca śūdrasyāpi vṛttihīnasya bhikṣācaraṇe na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1395: kecitsarveṣu varṇeṣu bhavaṃ sārvavarṇikamiti vigrahaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ sarvaśabdasya prayojanaṃ na vidmaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1399: dvipadasya bhikṣāṃ dehīti śabdasya prārthanāyāṃ dehītyasyāpi ca sārmathyāt prāptasyādau brāhmaṇena bhavacchabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1402: bhavacchabdasya prātipadikatvātkevalasya ca prayogābhāvāt strīṇāṃ sakāśe tadāmantritavibhaktyantaḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1407: yathāha gṛhyasmṛtiḥ 'brāhmaṇo bhikṣeta bhavati bhikṣāṃ dehīti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1410: kṣāṃ ca hiṃ ca na vardhayet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1427: teṣāṃ yo yaḥ prathamanirdiṣṭaḥ tatra tatra pariharet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1428: anyatrālābhe pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ parihṛtyāpi teṣāmeva sakāśe
GSD37gautdhcu:1434: idaṃ bhaikṣamiti gurave kathayitvā tato bhuṃkṣveti tenānujñāto bhuñjīta /
GSD37gautdhcu:1464: tathaiva manurapi mekhalādibhiḥ saha pratipattividhānāt brahmacāriṇaḥ kamaṇḍaludhāraṇaṃ jñāpayati-
GSD37gautdhcu:1473: apsu pāṇau ca kāṣṭhe ca kalpitaḥ pāvakaḥ śuciḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1477: idānīṃ yadi brahmacārī guroḥ samyagvinayenāvatiṣṭheta tadānīṃ kiṃ kartavyamityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1482: adhikārādeva siddhe śiṣyagrahaṇamanyasyāpi śāsanīyasya bhāryāputrāderayameva dharma iti jñāpanārtham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1498: sarveṣu vedeṣu yāvataiva kālenādhyayanamabhinirvartayet tāvantameva kālaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caret tasya tadarthatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1499: sarvagrahaṇaṃ yadyekamadhīyīta yadi vā dvau yadi vā sarvānityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1501: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1508: gururācāryaḥ arthena prayojanena nimantryaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ gurvarthe karavāṇīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1513: tena vā alaṃ gurudakṣiṇayetyanujñātasya snānaṃ samāvṛttiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1514: idānīṃ pitrādyanekagurusannidhāne kaḥ prathamaḥ pūjya ityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1517: sa śreṣṭhaḥ pradhāno gurūṇāṃ anyeṣāṃ pitrādīnām /
GSD37gautdhcu:1531: yadi pitaivācāryo bhavati tadā pitā viśiṣyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1536: ityatra pitṛśabdena pitaivācāryo yo bhavati sa eva gṛhyata iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1544: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1554: evaṃ hi smṛtyantaraṃ pratibhāti-“eṣa vo 'bhihito dharmo brāhmaṇasya caturvidhaḥ“iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1555: tatra brāhmaṇasyaivāyaṃ caturvidho dharmaḥ itarayorekavidha ityāśaṅkā syāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1556: tarhi tatkathamiti cet tatra brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1557: tatkathaṃ gamyata iti cet trayāṇāmeva varṇānāṃ catvāra āśramā iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1558: tathā cāpastambaḥ-“sarveṣāmupanayanaprabhṛti samānamācāryakule vāsaḥ sarveṣāmanūtsargo vidyāyā buddhvā karmāṇi yatkāmayettadārabheta“iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1563: tathā ca śrutiḥ-“trayo dharmaskandhā yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathamastapa eva dvitīyastṛtīyamācāryakule vasanametānāruhya brahmalokaṃ gacchati brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvameti“iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1576: tathā jābālaśrutāvapi tulyaphalataiva śrūyate-'brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī bhavet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1579: yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet gṛhādvā vanādvā brahmalokaṃ gacchati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1585: āpastambopyāha-'catvāra āśramā gārhasthyamācāryakule vasanaṃ maunaṃ vānapraśthyāmiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1586: teṣu sarveṣu yathopadeśamavyagraṃ vartamānaḥ kṣemaṃ gacchati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1589: ucyate- yo yasyānuṣṭhāne samarthaḥ tasya tadāśramapratipattyarthaṃ itarāśramavidhānamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1593: evaṃ gṛhīte vyutthānaśrutirapyupapadyate-'evaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ viditvā putreṣaṇāyāśca vitteṣaṇāyāśca lokeṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1594: itarathā hi bhikṣācaryamiti saṃnyāsopadeśo nopapadyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1602: tataśca padārtho 'pyevaṃ grahītavyaḥ-gṛhastho jāyamānaḥ pūrvavāsanayā gārhasthyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1604: tribhiḥ ṝṇaiḥ sambadhyate-yajñena devebhya ṝṇī bhavatyato yajñaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1606: brahmacaryeṇa ṝṣibhyaḥ ataḥ parvādau brahmacaryarakṣaṇaṃ kartavyamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1618: brahmalokaprāpterapi samuccayaphalatvenopadiṣṭatvāt jābālaśrutāvapi prādhānyena pūrvaṃ samuccayapakṣasyaivābhihitatvāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1621: āpastambavākye 'pi teṣu sarveṣviti bahuvacanāt- naikasminneva vartamānaḥ kiṃ tu sarveṣveva vartamāna ityabhiprāyeṇoktatvāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1624: yāvajjīvaśruterapi“gṛhī vanaṃ praviśedyadi gṛhameva kāmayeta tadā yāvajjīvasagnihotraṃ juhuyāt“iti jābālaśrutivākye anityatvadarśanāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1630: asamartho yaḥ samuccayānuṣṭhāne andhapaṅgutvādidoṣeṇa niḥsvatvādinā vā tena vikalpapakṣo 'pyāśrayaṇīyaḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa bruvata ityarthasiddhasyāpyupanyāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1634: tasminnutpanne yatra kvāpyāśrame sthitasya puruṣārthaḥ sidhyatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1643: vikhanasā proktaṃ śāstraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tadvidhinā vartata iti vaikhānasaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1650: nanu ca smṛtyantare vaikhānasamabhidhāya bhikṣurityuktaḥ iha kimarthaṃ kramabheda iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1661: iti smṛtyantaramavalambya gārhasthyādeva saṃnyāsaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaḥ kramabheda iti varṇayanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1668: evaṃ ca vaikhānasasya sapatnīkatvapakṣe 'pi brahmacaryarakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1670: grahaṇaṃ gṛhasthotpannānāmeva teṣāṃ dharme ādhikāra ityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1674: iti teṣāṃ gṛhastha eva yonirityukte evakārādevetareṣāṃ brahmacaryarakṣaṇe siddhe evamabhidhānameṣāṃ punarnivṛttirmā bhūditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1675: yadi te gārhasthyaṃ prati nivṛtti bhaveyuḥ tadā te caṇḍālā bhavanti kutaḥ ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1678: pratyavasitāḥ pratinivṛttāḥ ye parivrājakatāpasāḥ naiṣṭhikavaikhānasāḥ tasmātteṣāṃ jātānyapatyāni caṇḍālaiḥsahavāsayedrājā grāmo vetyarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1679: idānīmāśramadharmeṣu krameṇa vaktavyeṣu prāpteṣu sarvāśramasāmyādupakurvāṇasya pūrvamuktvā naiṣṭhikasya krameṇa prāptaṃ vaktumāha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1682: nanu ca naiṣṭikasyaivedaṃ nopakurvāṇasyeti kathaṃ jñāyata iti ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1686: tarhi brahmacārigrahaṇaṃ kimartamiti cet yenopakurvāṇavratamanuṣṭhitaṃ tasyaiva
GSD37gautdhcu:1694: evaṃ ca japa evāsya viśiṣṭaṃ dharmasādhanamiti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1695: ācārya iti prakṛte gurugrahaṇaṃ mātāpitrorapi śuśrūṣāprāpaṇārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1697: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ śuśrūṣā paramaṃ tapa ucyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1712: evaṃ yathopadeśaṃ vartamāno brahmalokaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānamavāpnoti sa cejjitendriyo bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:1715: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā ca yo nara /
GSD37gautdhcu:1716: na hṛṣyati glāyati vā sa vijñeyo jitendriyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1721: yadbrahmacāriṇa uktaṃ taduttareṣāmapi bhavati yadaviruddhaṃ dyūtādivarjanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1725: caśabdaḥ uttarasya yadvakṣyamāṇaṃ tadapyaviruddhaṃ pūrveṣāmapi bhavatīti jñāpayati,
GSD37gautdhcu:1731: tasyābhidhīyamānāḥ dharmāḥ aviruddhāḥ kecitkathaṃ nāma pūrveṣāṃ syuriti tadarthaṃ vyutkrameṇābhidhānam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1737: nanu ca nityasyaiva tyāgo yuktaḥ upavītaśabdena nyāsaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyate-
GSD37gautdhcu:1742: na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅge na cele na tripuṣkare //
GSD37gautdhcu:1743: nāgāre nāsane nānne yasya syānmokṣavittu saḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1748: ucyate-prathamaṃ tāvadyaduktaṃ yajñādhikārābhāvāt iti tatra yāgaśabdo devapūjanādāvapi vartate devapūjanaṃ tvasya dhyānena paramātmapūjanāmastyeva kutaḥ ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1752_1: śabdādayo hotā etai ṛtvigbhistena sruveṇa taddhaviraharaharyatinā paramātmanyagnau hotavyam'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1755: iti tatrāpi kuṇḍikādīnāṃ vaicitryavarjanārthaḥ saṅgasyaiva parityāgaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1761: iti sarvāśramādhikārāt sāmānyatvena vartamāno 'pi viśeṣadharmeṇa bādhyata iti cet, na,
GSD37gautdhcu:1766: iti nirdeśaḥ sarvāśramādhikāranivṛttyartha iti jñātuṃ śakyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1767: tatastatra sarvāśramādhikārābhāvāt pūrvāparavirodhaprasaṅgo mā bhūditi 'na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅgaḥ';
GSD37gautdhcu:1768: iti saṅgamātrasyaiva tyāgaḥ kriyata iti grahītuṃ śakyata eveti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1770: tasmāttenāpi na kuṇḍyādīnāṃ tyāgaḥ yaccoktam-'nakhāni nikṛtya yajñopavītaṃ visṛjya';
GSD37gautdhcu:1771: iti tatrāpi prathamaṃ saṃnyāsāśramapraveśakāle purāṇasya yajñopavītasya tyāgamātraṃ kriyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:1773: kutaḥ ? 'nakhāni nikṛtya purāṇaṃ vastraṃ yajñopavītaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ tyaktvā navāni gṛhītvā'śramaṃ praviśet';
GSD37gautdhcu:1784: yuṣmākaṃ tu yajñopavītaṃ tyaktavyamiti vacanābhāvāddoṣa eveti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1785: bhikṣuranicaya iti vaktavye dharmāsyādāvabhidhānaṃ nityasyāgnihotradārāderapi tyāgārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1786: evaṃ ca gārhasthyādeva yaḥ pravrajet tena śrautasya ca smārtasya cāgneḥ dāraputraprapañcayajñādisahitasya tyāgaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1788: vaisānasādeva yaḥ pravrajet tatrāpi sapatnīkapakṣe prāptasya dārasya śrāmaṇakāgnisahitasya pañcayajñāderapi tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1792: iti japasyaiva pradhānatvenopadiṣṭatvāt tenaivāgniparigrahāderapyabhāvo jñātuṃ śakyata eveti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1795: ityanena brahmacāriṇaḥ uktena brahmacaryarakṣaṇenāsyāpi siddherūrdhvaretograhaṇaṃ yathā yathā retasaḥ kṣayo bhavati tathā tathopāyaḥ kartavya ityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1808: varṣāsviti bahuvacanāt grāmādgrāmāntaraṃ caturṣu māseṣu na gacchedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1811: tathāca smṛtyantaram- 'grāmānte devagṛhe śūnyāgāre vṛkṣamūle vā'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1817: tadarthaṃ grāmaṃ gacchet arthāccheṣaṃ kālamaraṇye devāyatanādau tiṣṭhediti siddham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1825: anivṛttaṃ yasmin gṛhe pratyākhyātaṃ tasmindine tadgrahaṃ punarna praviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1827: yathā'ha vasiṣṭhaḥ-'vidhūme sannamusale ekaśāṭhīparihito 'jinena vā'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1840: dharmayogaṃ pathipraśnaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1849: ityanena sarvasyaipacayikadravyasya parityāge sati pratiprasavaḥ kriyate-
GSD37gautdhcu:1859: eke manyante pratigrahadoṣaparihārārthaṃ prahīṇaṃ yadrathyādau tyaktaṃ tatprakṣālya paridadhyāt nirṇijyeti pratyātmikaśaucaprāpaṇārtham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1866: cet, tatra jaṅgamavadha eva hiṃseti kecidvadanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1872: apagate ṛtau dvitīyāṃ rātriṃ grāme na vaset /
GSD37gautdhcu:1875: apartugrahaṇādvarṣāsu kadācit dvitīyāmapi vasato na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1877: tataśca tasminvarṣākāle ekatraiva vasedanyatra na vasedityarthasiddham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1882: bījānāṃ vrīhyādīnāṃ vadhaṃ avahananādi na kuryāt //
GSD37gautdhcu:1923: ākrāmediti siddhe adhitiṣṭhediti vacanaṃ pramādādākramato doṣābhāvajñāpanārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1942: aikāśramyaṃ tvācāryaḥ pratyakṣavidhānāt gārhasthasya gārhasthasya // Gaut_3.36 //
